models

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The album class keeps track of the photos that are added to it, the album thumbnail, and the range of the dates that the album covers
    Author:
    Evan Loriot, Joseph Klaszky
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String name
      Name of the album.
      int numPhotos
      Number of photos that the album contains.
      java.util.ArrayList<Photo> photos
      List of all the photo objects that the album contains.

      • earliestDate

        public java.lang.String earliestDate()
        Iterates over the album and finds the photo that has the oldest date.
        Returns:
        String -- A string that represents date of the oldest photo.

      • latestDate

        public java.lang.String latestDate()
        Iterates over the album and finds the most recent photo.
        Returns:
        String -- A string that represents the date of the most recent photo.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String -- Returns a string of the form: "Album name: (number of photos) earliest date - latest date.

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getThumb()
        Gets the first image of an album to use as a thumbnail.
        Returns:
        Image -- The first photo present in the album.

      • addPhoto

        public Photo addPhoto(java.lang.String location)
        Adds a new photo to the album and increments the number of photos.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the photo being added to the album.
        Returns:
        Photo -- instance of photo object added to album

      • deletePhoto

        public void deletePhoto(java.lang.String location)
        Removes a photo from the album and decrements the number of photos.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the photo being removed from the album.

      • getPhoto

        public Photo getPhoto(java.lang.String location,
                      int instance)
        Iterates over the album to find a particular photo.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the photo the method is looking for.
        instance - the instance number of a photo in album (if duplicate != 1 else 1)
        Returns:
        Photo -- If found returns the photo object from the album.
